      • initWrite

        public static void initWrite(java.io.RandomAccessFile file,
                             int bytesNum)
        Initialize, also can be use to format
        Parameters:
        file - represents the random access file that represents the physical disk storage
        bytesNum - number of bytes that are going to be reserved on the Disk

      • writeByte

        public static void writeByte(java.io.RandomAccessFile file,
                             int pos,
                             int element)
        Parameters:
        file - represents the random access file that represents the physical disk storage
        pos - position on the file where the byte is going to be written
        element - the element that is going to be written on the given position
